column5: After a recent good faith measure from the Canadian Representative (Northern Cajun Chapter 101) who has stopped sending cold weather down South. The Southern Contingency has decided to allow a limited amount of warm weather up North on a trial bases. We would all like to thank CrappieSteve for the good faith that was shown and the offer of one cigar and one beer to Aplumma to end this stalemate.   Art
I don't know if you should trust them I'm still getting the cold weather here in New Jersey.
Someone check the agreement.  It's snowing like mad up here.  Pam
Weather much warmer in Nakina than NE Ohio.  Boy could we use weather other than cold, rain, snow, sleet etc.
Still waiting........................... I guess its been delayed at Customs since it is supposed to snow on Sunday-Monday! Kill me now....please

It appears I spoke to soon the information that the Crazy Canadian Cajun gave me must be bad. Maybe I can pay someone .75 cents to give him a nasty hangnail or such. I have pleaded with the local officials and so far they have responded with " What the he** are you talking about". Talks will be resume next week after CrappieSteve stops telling me stories.   Art
damn hurry up and get the warm air sent up here.  its cold and windy here.  guess its better then being in dallas right now though!
Do you guys just go outside, whine about the cold and then blame it on Canada? It's not our fault. P.S. keep your smog.  http://wwwa.accuweather.com/maps-satellite...m=1&large=1
All I know is I'm getting a Noreaster that comes out of the North. On the bright side the surf fishing picks up before and after these storms.
